alert.note: Alert for St Croix; St.Thomas...St. John.. and Adjacent Islands (Virgin Islands) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 13 at 4:04AM AST until December 14 at 9:00AM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Sustained winds at 20 to 30 mph with frequent gusts around 35 to 45 mph. * WHERE...Across Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands. * WHEN...Through at least Thursday. * IMPACTS...Outdoor unsecured objects could blow around or be damaged. Equipment operators may experience safety risk with high baskets or ladder extensions.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that winds of 25 mph or greater and/or frequent gusts of 35 to 40 mph are expected in the advisory area. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: St Croix; St.Thomas...St. John.. and Adjacent Islands
